publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-890.2 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Nuclear Waste-As an amendment to motion (S2M-890) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, insert at end "calls on the Scottish Executive to stop the importation of any nuclear waste from any foreign country, and further calls on the Executive to implement an investment programme in the safe disposal and storage of nuclear waste in Scotland to generate jobs and safeguard the environment."
